text: Paolo Babbini (19 August 1935 – 25 May 2019) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party (PSI). Babbini served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies for three terms, from 1979 to 1983 and two back-to-back terms from 1987 to 1994. He was born in Bologna. He was a municipal councillor of Bologna for over 25 years. Babbini died on 25 May 2019 in Bologna, at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Paolo Babbini – Chamber of Deputies profile Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna Category:People from Bologna Category:Socialist politicians
title: Paolo Babbini
